game.name: Slope Ball
game.description:
Can you imagine what activities you can do with a rolling ball? Let your intelligent ball handing skill work while jumping from one platform to another in a search for the highest score in Slope Ball. This brand new arcade puzzle world is filled with action-packed gameplay, colorful graphics and various obstacles. Take your seat on a ball and get ready to plunge into the action in your own style! It depends on how fast you swipe ball left and right to flay in the air for long to improve your score. 
The platforms are full of difficulties and obstacles. Avoiding falling down in this awesome running game! Do not forget to slow down your speed on a randomized slope and focus only how far you can go. The speed of ball increases as you cover a long distance. May be it sounds simple to handle this game, but playing it will surely make your heart full of extreme adrenaline rush. Keep running while avoiding the obstacles and red blocks in this html5 fun game!
Make sure that your ball does not miss the track otherwise you will lose the game immediately. We are damn sure that you will hit the best score to find your name on the top of the leaderboard in this fantastic arcade game. Collect different crystals on your way to boost your final score! Good luck to put your quick reaction skills to test to keep your ball on the platform! Many different challenges are waiting for you in this endless running game. Complete them and grab the gems on your way to unlock lots of new balls!
